title: WATCH: Monkeying around in The Crags
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Near Plettenberg Bay on the Garden Route in South Africa, The Crags has treetop accommodation, a forest spa, free-roaming primates and a bubbly wine route that together create the perfect long weekend escape.

And you don't have to drive far between these spots on your exploration - just someone to share the memories with.

READ MORE: A spa in the forest that's like a fairy tale come to life

description: Near Plettenberg Bay on the Garden Route in South Africa, The Crags has treetop accommodation, a forest spa, free-roaming primates and a bubbly wine route that together create the perfect long weekend escape.
